Snow na-efe bụ snow nke ifufe na-ebuli site n'elu, na ányá (1.8  ) ma ọ bụ karịa, nke ga-ebelata ányà. Snow na-efe efe nwèrè ike ịpụta site na snow na-ada ma ọ bụ snow nke gbakọtara n'ala mana ifufe siri ike na-eburu ya ma na-ebugharị ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe ndị a chọrọ màkà oké ifufe
Ọ bụrụ na snow nọgide n'okpuru 1.8 m (isií ), a ga-akpọ ya snow na-agagharị agagharị (METAR koodu DRSN)
Snow nke a na-afụli elu nwèrè ike ịba dị ka snowdrifts.
